phot_class.models.snana_sims¶

The models.snana_sims module generates light curves using SNANA parses SNANA files.

phot_class.models.snana_sims.create_file_path(cid, data_dir)¶

Construct the file path for an SNANA models result

Parameters

  • cid (int) – cid of the SN

  • data_dir (str) – path of SNANA models light curve data directory

Returns

A Path object representing models results for the given cid

phot_class.models.snana_sims.read_lc(path)¶

Read SNANA models results and transform to sncosmo format

Parameters

  • path (str) – Path of the file to read

  • DATA_DIR (str) – path of SNANA models light curve data directory

Returns

z,t0,x0,st,c

Return type

A SNcosmo-format data table with metadata

phot_class.models.snana_sims.write_lc(num, out_dir, path)¶

Parse SNANA data table into sncosmo table and write to a file

Parameters

  • num (int) – how many light curves to parse

  • out_dir (str) – path of SNANA models light curve data directory

  • path (str) – path to write output files
